str_referral_notes: The referral program lasts for 4 weeks starting on April 15, 2019. When you invite friends to play the game via your referral link, you get 8% of all their wagers. That is, for every 100 EOS they bet, you get 8 EOS.
tip_chooseBetFirst: Please choose the amount to bet.
tip_betTimeOut: Time's up for placing bets. Please wait for the next round.
tip_hasBeted: You've already placed a bet. The race will begin shortly.
tip_betFull: You've exceeded max bet amount allowed.
tip_serverDataNull: Please wait for the data to be fully loaded.
tip_betOutBoundOfWinPool: You've exceeded max bet amount allowed (Insufficient EOS in the pool).
tip_bidLessMoney: Your bid must be higher than the current top bidder.
tip_cantEditSlogan: You are not the slogan owner.
tip_roundBeted: You've already placed a bet for this round.
